title: Mission to no man's land
creator_contributor_role: Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees, production company

description: A tour of a typical Austrian refugee camp, showing something of the extent of the problem. Yul Brynner records interviews with the refugees. One particularly moving sequence shows an elderly refugee talking on the long distance telephone with his family in the United States.
